full_text:
IN THE COURT OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF THE FIRST CLASS- TI
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
Present: Sri. Vinod Babu M.U
Judicial Magistrate of the First Class-III
Friday 15" day of February, 2025
CG. 1489/2020
Complainant : State represented by the Sub Inspector of Police,
Museum Police Station ( Museum Crime 482/20).
(By Asst. Public Prosecutor)
Accused : Suraj, aged 19/20 years, S/o Suresh Kumar, Chaithanya
veedu, Ganapathiyamkodu ward, Chayam, Tholikkodu
village.
(ByAdv. Sri.Sakkir Husain. M)
Offences : Ufs. 279,337 and 338 of Indian Penal Code & Sec. 134
(A), 134 (B) of Motor Vehicle Act.
Order : Accused is convicted and sentenced to pay a fine of
Rs. 2,000/- for the offences U/Ss. 279,337 and 338 of
Indian Penal Code & Sec. 134 (A), 134 (B) of Motor
Vehicle Act. In default of payment of fine the accused
shall undergo simple imprisonment for 10 days.
Heard, perused the records and passed the following:
JUDGMENT
1. The accused stands charge sheeted by the Sub Inspector of Police, Museum Police
Station alleging offence U/Ss. 279,337 and 338 of Indian Penal Code & Sec. 134
(A), 134 (B) of Motor Vehicle Act.
2. Accused pleaded guilty through counsel . Particulars of offence U/Ss. 279,337 and

2
338 of Indian Penal Code & Sec. 134 (A), 134 (B) of Motor Vehicle Act
was read over and explained to the accused and he pleaded guilty. This
court is convinced that the plea of the accused is voluntary. Hence his plea
is accepted. The accused is found guilty for the offence U/S. 279,337 and
338 of Indian Penal Code & Sec. 134 (A), 134 (B) of Motor Vehicle Act
and he is convicted thereunder.

3. Accused is convicted and sentenced to pay a fine of Rs. 2,000/- for the
offences U/Ss279,337 and 338 of Indian Penal Code & Sec. 134 (A), 134
(B) of Motor Vehicle Act. In default of payment of fine the accused shall
undergo simple imprisonment for 10 days.

(Dictated to the Confidential Assistant, transcribed and typed by her, corrected and
pronounced by me, in open court, on this the 15" day of February, 2025.)

Judicial Magistrate of the First Class- ITI

Thiruvananthapuram
